name: 5 Minutes Left
description:
There's 5 minutes left. Until what? That's for you to find out.

Blues are a discriminated race. Beyond the colors and the pretty flowers of the world there's tension. Some characters may hint at some of the events that shaped the society the way it is, while others may hint at what there is to come. Some may just enjoy their day, others may throw cynical remarks.

All in all, you have just 5 minutes left.
